div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-uQSCkd jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

span.style: font-family: Lato;
span.strong:
Student Home Learning Resources
Recursos De Aprendizaje En Casa

div.jsaction: click:cOuCgd; mousedown:UX7yZ; mouseup:lbsD7e; mouseenter:tfO1Yc; mouseleave:JywGue; focus:AHmuwe; blur:O22p3e; contextmenu:mg9Pef;

span.style: top: -11px
font-family: Lato; font-size: 25px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

div.p: Thank you for your enthusiastic response to the Adams 14 Student Home Learning Plan. Although school buildings are closed to slow the spread of coronavirus, our students in levels Preschool through Grade 12 can continue their education at home using a variety of learning resources.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

div.p: Please be advised that Governor Polis’ executive order requires Colorado public schools to remain closed through Friday, April 17 with a currently scheduled reopening date, Monday, April 20. The District will inform parents and guardians of any changes to the schedule to reopen schools.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

div.p: We appreciate your active participation in your student’s home learning plan. Click to review the entire Student Home Learning Plan.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Lato; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: To navigate the Student Home Learning site, please use the tabs located in the upper right corner of the page:

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Lato; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
font-family: Lato; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
font-family: Lato; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Lato; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Lato; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Connecting the Chromebook to a wireless network

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Lato; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Lato; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Lato; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
font-family: Lato; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
font-family: Lato; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Lato; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Lato; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Accessing Clever and Google Classroom (for Phase II (April 6-April 17) of the Home Learning Plan)

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Lato; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Lato; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
font-family: Lato; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
font-family: Lato; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: to access choice boards by grade level.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Lato; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Choice boards provide a number of activities for students to complete using easy-to-access support materials from their home environment. To complete each choice board, students will use their creativity and problem-solving skills.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

div.jsaction: click:cOuCgd; mousedown:UX7yZ; mouseup:lbsD7e; mouseenter:tfO1Yc; mouseleave:JywGue; focus:AHmuwe; blur:O22p3e; contextmenu:mg9Pef;

span.style: top: -11px
font-family: Lato; font-size: 25px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Lato; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Gracias por sus entusiastas respuestas hacia el Plan de Aprendizaje en Casa para Estudiantes de Adams 14. Aunque las escuelas están cerradas para frenar la propagación del coronavirus, nuestros estudiantes en los niveles de prescolar al 12º grado, pueden continuar su educación en casa, utilizando una variedad de recursos de aprendizaje.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Lato; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Tengan en cuenta que la orden ejecutiva del Gobernador Polis, requiere que las escuelas públicas de Colorado permanezcan cerradas hasta el viernes, 17 de abril con una fecha de reapertura actualmente programada, para el lunes, 20 de abril. El Distrito informará a los padres y tutores de cualquier cambio en lo programado para reabrir las escuelas.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Lato; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Agradecemos su participación activa en el plan de aprendizaje en el hogar de su hijo.

span.style: font-family: Lato; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: underline; vertical-align: baseline;
span.a: Haga clic para revisar el Plan de Aprendizaje de Estudiantes es su totalidad

span.style: font-family: Lato; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Lato; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Para entrar al sitio web del Aprendizaje para Estudiantes en Casa, por favor use las indicaciones de la esquina superior derecha de la página:

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Lato; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

font-family: Lato; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: para ingresar a la información sobre:

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Lato; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Expectativas de estudiantes para el uso de Chromebook

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Lato; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Conectar el Chromebook a una red inalámbrica

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Lato; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Lato; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Lato; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
font-family: Lato; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
font-family: Lato; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: para ingresar a la información en:

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Lato; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Lato; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Ingresando a Clever y Google Classroom (para Fase II – 6 al 17 de abril) en el Plan de Aprendizaje en Casa)

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Lato; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Lato; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
font-family: Lato; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
font-family: Lato; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: para ingresar a las tablas de opciones por nivel de grado.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Lato; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Las tablas de opciones proporcionan un número de actividades, para que los estudiantes completen utilizando el fácil acceso a los materiales de apoyo, en el entorno de su hogar. Para completar cada tabla de opciones, los estudiantes utilizarán su creatividad y habilidades para resolver problemas.

h3.div: Please read the Adams 14 Chromebook Distribution Information
Students can use the 'Choice Boards' tab to view and access the non-digital instructional content by grade level.
Phase II: Monday, April 6-Wednesday, April 17 (may extend beyond April 17)
Grade-level specific instructional content offered through Clever and Google Classroom.

h3.div: Por favor lea Distribución de Computadoras Chromebook de Adams 14
Use el 'Choice Boards' tab para ver e ingresar al contenido instructivo no digital por nivel de grado.
Fase II: Lunes, 6 de Abril - Miércoles, 17 Abril (puede extenderse hasta después del 17 de abril)
Contenido instructivo específico para cada grado ofrecido a través de Clever y Google Classroom:
